软件包 com.taobao.datax.common.util

类摘要
ArrayUtils A tool class used to do some operation on Array.
DbReaderProxy A proxy which provides to database Reader plugin.
DbSource A tool class which wraps DataSource.
DbUtils  
DbWriterProxy A proxy which provides to database Writer plugin.
DfsUtils  
OracleTnsAssist A assistant class to parse a tnsfile Usage: OracleTnsAssist assist = OracleTnsAssist.newInstance("/home/hedgehog/tnsnames.ora"); List> details = assist.search("tnsname"); details: [{'SID'='dwdb', 'HOST'='192.168.0.1', 'PORT'='1521'}, {'SID'='dwdb', 'HOST'='192.168.0.2', 'PORT'='1521'}, {'SID'='dwdb', 'HOST'='192.168.0.3', 'PORT'='1521'},]
SplitUtils  
StrUtils A tool class which used to deal with strings.
